processSteps.title: 10. 정식 오픈
processSteps.description:
- Launch event & promotional campaign
- Performance monitoring during the first month

processSteps.title: 9. 시스템 구축
processSteps.description:
- Supplier selection & contract for food & beverages
- Partnership with delivery platforms (Wolt, Lieferando, Uber Eats)
- POS, reservation, and payment system integration

processSteps.title: 8. 직원 채용 및 교육
processSteps.description:
- Hiring key personnel (chefs, kitchen staff, service team)
- Hygiene & safety training
- Service and operations manual training

processSteps.title: 7. 온라인 마케팅
processSteps.description:
- Marketing strategy & promotion planning
- Professional photos & videos showcasing brand story
- Optimized website development
- Social media & promotional channel management

processSteps.title: 6. 시공 및 설치
processSteps.description:
- Interior construction Kitchen equipment & furniture installation
- Contractor selection & project management
- Final touch-ups and finishing details

processSteps.title: 5. 인테리어 디자인
processSteps.description:
- Concept development & space planning
- Electrical & facility layout planning
- Architectural blueprint preparation
- Furniture & lighting design

processSteps.title: 4. 브랜딩
processSteps.description:
- Visual identity design
- Logo, signage, menu, and packaging design

processSteps.title: 3. 법적 허가와 행정 절차
processSteps.description:
- Company formation (UG, GmbH)
- Business registration (Gewerbeanmeldung)
- Liquor license (Gaststättenerlaubnis) Health department approval

processSteps.title: 2. 입지 선정과 계약
processSteps.description:
- Local market & commercial district analysis
- Property condition & zoning verification
- Lease negotiation

processSteps.title: 1. 비즈니스 계획
processSteps.description:
- Target audience analysis & market research
- Menu concept & pricing strategy
- Budgeting, investment, and revenue forecast
- Business plan for official submission
